name: S'Lots of Gems
description:
Pull the arm, roll rows and columns of gems, and make them match. Watch the gem lamps and how they are lit, as two lamps make the corresponding gem reducted from the next turn (arm pull). Score up, make credits for even more turns!

Use the mouse cursor to left click on the arm and the arrows. You can restart any time by pressing the RESTART button. Press QUIT to exit the game. Press the + and - signs to manipulate sound volume.
See every relevant rule in the game, on the left side of the screen.
